refsection.title: Introduction
refsection.para: The p:namespace-rename step renames any namespace declaration or use of a namespace in a document to a new IRI value.

para.error: It is a dynamic error if the XML namespace (http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace) or the XMLNS namespace (http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/) is the value of either the from option or the to option.
It is a dynamic error if as a consequence of changing or removing the namespace of an attribute the attribute's name is not unique on the respective element.
